msItem.title: Þorsteins saga Víkingssonar
msItem.incipit: Þad er uphaf þessarar søgu ad Loge hefur kongur heited
msItem.explicit: Og lykur hier nu søgunne af Þorsteine Vykings syne.

msItem.title: Rímur af Alexander ok Loðvík
Alexanders rímur og Loðvíks
msItem.incipit: Þundar edli argalans, ecki dofni storum, fliugie eins og glædu glans, glygge i mestu orum
msItem.explicit: Þattur fluttur hverfr hier, hrærdur i værdar fundum, mattur stuttur mier filger, mærdar bærdur stundum.
msItem.note: Eight rímur cantos, dedicated to sýslumaður Jón Árnason of Ingjaldshóll, 1763 (cf. Kålund, Katalog II:525).

msItem.title: Rímur af Skáld-Helga
Skáld-Helga rímur
msItem.incipit: Fordum ätte eg fræda brunn, er feck eg keipt af liòsa
msItem.explicit: hier skal ute harma spreingur, og Helga rymur allar.

msItem.title: Rímur af Ragnari lodbrok
msItem.incipit: Sof þu alldrei Svala Tyrs, syfelldt þig uppvekur, edla Balldur ølldu fyrs ad sier mig hann tekur
msItem.explicit: Glædu flæda gynars vyn, gödum biöd eg sendi mædann qvæda myn so dvyn, mödur hrödur lendi.
msItem.note: Dedicated to sýslumaður Jón Árnason, 1758 (cf. Kålund, Katalog II:526).

msItem.title: Völsunga rímur
msItem.rubric: Hier byriast Rymur af Wolsungum Budlungum Giukungum Ragnare lodbrok
msItem.incipit: Herians bisti haukur minn hars ad kinppnr[?] rònnumm
msItem.explicit: Odarfræde eyda lid, ladist giædumm vyrda, liöda qvæde blydann bid, bæde
msItem.note: Dedicated to sýslumaður Jón Árnason, 1758 (cf. Kålund, Katalog II:526).
Some leaves have been cropped along the upper margin resulting in loss of text.
Traces of blind ruling on the outer margins of most leaves.

support.watermark: Crown watermark visible on fol. 127. The manuscript appears to be composite and likely contains multiple other watermaks.

supportDesc.foliation: Foliated in pencil in the lower corner of every tenth recto leaf and at the end of each item. Fol. 89 misnumbered as 90, so subsequent foliation up to 120 is off by one. Correct foliation resumes on fol. 127.

condition.p: The first 25 leaves are heavily worn and have been restored more than once. Some of the repairs contain manuscript waste (e.g. fol. 127). A piece of fol. 214 has been excised and covered with a pasteover containing a fragment of a letter dated 1732 in Fagradal. On the recto Finis libri has been added, and the verso reads: Christian i Vigri a bókina.

decoNote.p: The book opens with a 7-line, partially colored initial.

additions.p: The letter in the front flyleaf is dated 15 June 1789 in Gardstódum (Garðsstaðir in the West Fjords?) with the autograph of a certain Jón Sigurdsson. The front and rear pastedowns and flyleaves bear several autographs, some of which are only partially legible. A thanksgiving verse has been written on fol. 215v.

binding.p: Bound in contemporary full calf with blind-tooled floriated ornaments. The initials BBS (?) (possibly Björn Bjarnarson, whose autograph appears on fol. 215v) have been pressed into the center of the front cover. There is evidence of earlier book clasps (holes, discoloration) on the rear cover, but they have not survived. The flyleaves and pastedowns contain manuscript waste bearing fragments of private letters.

revisionDesc.change: Created as subset of full file on handrit.is.
Introduced repository auth file. Updated repository element pointing, adding @ref and removing @key.
Extracted pagination and page dimension data from previous version.
Added catalog information from Kålund and handrit.
